snippet: Replacement of cars and trucks damaged in Hurricane Sandy contributed to the industry’s best monthly pace since 2008.
abstract: Automakers say new-vehicle sales in United States rose 15 percent in November to 1.14 million, as replacement of cars and trucks damaged in Hurricane Sandy contributed to industry's best monthly sales rate in four years; strong performance indicates total sales for 2012 will exceed most forecasts.
lead_paragraph: Replacement of cars and trucks damaged in Hurricane Sandy contributed to the industry’s best monthly pace since 2008.

headline.main: Hurricane Helps to Lift Auto Sales to 4-Year High
headline.print_headline: Hurricane Helps to Lift Auto Sales to 4-Year High
